spec.title: TTML Profiles for Internet Media Subtitles and Captions 1.2

algorithms.html: The Presentation Compositor SHALL render in Presentation Buffer Pn each successive intermediate synchronic document En using the following steps in order:

steps.html: clear the pixels, except for the first intermediate synchronic document E0 for the which the pixels of P0 SHALL be assumed to have been cleared;
paint, according to stacking order, all background pixels for each region;
paint all pixels for background colors associated with text or image subtitle content; and
paint the text or image subtitle content.
